name: Dominik Bečaj
description: A resume site for Dominik Bečaj, containing contact information and all professional experiences which may be of interest to a future employer

tasks: Developing and maintaining a Spring boot enterprise application
Writing Bash scripts and working with Linux system
Writing CPro programs for database processing
Creating REST API backend using NestJS for mobile apps
Setup and use of Amazon Web Services
Setup and use of MongoDB and PostgreSQL
Setting up computers for industrial automation

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.text: Dobro poznam jezik JavaScript in njegovo nadgradnjo [TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/), saj sem ju pogosto uporabljal pri projektih. Od večjih ogrodji sem že delal z [ExpressJS](https://expressjs.com/) ter [NestJS](https://nestjs.com/) za backend, zelo rad pa za frontend uporabljam [React](https://reactjs.org/).

skills.name: Database
skills.text: Imam teoretsko znanje in izkušnje z ustvarjanjem in uporabo relacijskih podatkovnih baz SQL in ne-relacijskih NoSQL baz. Do sedaj sem uporabljal [PostgreSQL](https://www.postgresql.org/) za SQL ter [MongoDB](https://www.mongodb.com/) in [Firebase](https://firebase.google.com/) pri NoSQL.

skills.name: Java
skills.text: Poznam tudi jezik Java in njegova ogrodja, kot so [Spring](https://spring.io/) za backend in [Hibernate](https://hibernate.org/) ORM, ter jezik [Kotlin](https://kotlinlang.org/) za izdelavo Android aplikacij.

skills.name: CSS
skills.text: Znam uporabljati CSS za oblikovanje spletne vsebine. Da si olajšam delo rad uporabljam [Tailwind CSS](https://tailwindcss.com/) in [Bootstrap](https://getbootstrap.com/).

skills.name: Linux
skills.text: Linux uporabljam profesionalno in hobijsko, ker mi je všeč prilagajanje sistema mojim zahtevam. Znam pisati shell skripte, od orodji pa znam uporabljati regexp, sed ter vim.

skills.name: Python
skills.text: Za pisanje krajših skript in podatkovnega rudarjenja rad uporabljam Python. Od njegovih knjižnic uporabljam [NumPy](https://numpy.org/) in [matplotlib](https://matplotlib.org/).

competencies: Programming in C, Assembly, Python, Java, JavaScript

education.programName: Undergraduate Computer Science Degree, second year

education.institutionName: Secondary School of Electrical and Computer Engineering Ljubljana
competencies: Basics in microcontroller design and programming
